          EPOS, EPOS Recommends

          10 Best Dessert in Singapore To Satisfy Your Sweet Tooth

          Posted on August 24, 2022November 4, 2022 by Adrija Chakravarti

          What’s better than getting that sugar rush? Nothing, we say! No matter how full you are, there’s always space for dessert. And this time, we’ve found the best dessert in Singapore that’ll leave you feeling satisfied yet desiring for more. (These desserts are definitely worth the calories!) It doesn’t matter what you’re looking for, from cakes, tarts, muffins, brownies, mochi, ice creams and more, we’ve got them all!

          Contents hide
          Best Dessert in Singapore
          1. Nine Fresh
          2. Sweet Hut Dessert
          3. The Durian Bakery
          4. Chow Zan Dessert
          5. FLOR Patisserie
          6. Cake Spade
          7. Sunday Folks
          8. Atlas Coffeehouse
          9. Plain Vanilla Bakery
          10. 2am : Dessert Bar
          Conclusion
          Related Posts

          Best Dessert in Singapore

          1. Nine Fresh

          Source: Nine Fresh via Facebook – Dessert Singapore

          Facebook: Visit Here

          Instagram: Visit Here

          Website: https://ninefresh.com/

          Address: Locations

          Operating Hours: Locations

          Seeking those perfectly traditional Taiwanese desserts? You’ll find some of the best at Nine Fresh! Revitalising the zest of traditions with some new life, each dessert will take you straight to Nine Fresh’s inspiration – a quaint little town named Jiufen (九份). We recommend their Taro Ball Signatures like the Jellicious Cup, Fruity Ai-Yu Jelly or their Nine Fresh Signature. Plus, you can create your own custom bowl if you want to! Sometimes, a little bit of tradition is nice to experience… and the best traditional Taiwanese dessert in Singapore is right here at Nine Fresh!

          2. Sweet Hut Dessert

          Source: Sweet Hut Dessert via Facebook – Dessert Singapore

          Facebook: Visit Here

          Instagram: Visit Here

          Website: https://sweethut.sg/

          Address: 654 Geylang Rd, Singapore 389584

          Operating Hours: Thu-Tue, 12pm-12am | Closed on Wed

          Inspired by popular cafes and Asian dramas – specifically K-dramas – this eclectic dessert shop can be found in Geylang and is the perfect instagrammable spot to have a nice sweet dessert. Offering a specialised range of traditional desserts but with a modern twist, each menu item is made with Sweet Hut’s very own tried and true recipes. There’s something here that’ll appeal to everyone’s taste buds, don’t you worry!

          3. The Durian Bakery

          Source: The Durian Bakery via website – Dessert Singapore

          Facebook: Visit Here

          Instagram: Visit Here

          Website: https://thedurianbakery.com.sg/

          Address: The Commerze @ Irving, Singapore 369546 (Pickup only)

          Operating Hours: Daily 9am-5pm

          Durian fans, you’re gonna love this one! With an intense passion to create “The Richest Durian Experience”, The Durian Bakery has curated premium recipes with the best ingredients they can get. From durian mochi to fruit tarts to mooncakes, crepe cakes, ice cream cakes and cheesecakes, there’s no end to the amount of durian-filled options you’ll have. It’s a truly unforgettable experience you won’t want to miss!

          4. Chow Zan Dessert

          Source: Chow Zan Dessert via Facebook – Dessert Singapore

          Facebook: Visit Here

          Instagram: Visit Here

          Website: https://www.chowzan.sg/

          Address: 801 North Bridge Rd, Singapore 198769

          Operating Hours: Wed-Mon, 3pm-11pm | Closed on Tue

          Craving something sweet but you don’t know what you want to eat? Visit Chow Zan Dessert in Singapore so you can browse and indulge in over 70 local, Thai and Western dessert choices! They’ve got irresistible hot and cold desserts, peach gum, mango madness and more! We recommend trying out their popular White chendol, jellies and mango sago, but there’s so much more to choose from. You can explore something new every time!

          5. FLOR Patisserie

          Source: Flor Patisserie via Facebook – Dessert Singapore

          Facebook: Visit Here

          Instagram: Visit Here

          Website: https://cakeflor.com.sg/

          Address: Locations

          Operating Hours: Locations

          This Japanese-styled patisserie serves a twist on French pastries with Japanese-influences. Flor Patisserie believes in using the freshest and highest quality ingredients – and their desserts definitely reflect it. Each dessert is carefully made with precise actions and expert baking skills, so you can enjoy mouth-watering desserts. What’s more, their seasonal cakes change flavours every two months, so make sure to indulge in these exclusive flavours while you still can!

          6. Cake Spade

          Source: Cake Spade via Instagram – Dessert Singapore

          Instagram: Visit Here

          Website: https://cakespade.com/

          Address: 283 South Bridge Road, Singapore 058832

          Operating Hours: Mon-Thu, 11am-10pm | Fri-Sat, 11am-10:30pm

          Opened in 2013, Cake Spade’s pink facade paints a pretty picture of what you should expect: cute, pretty desserts that don’t sacrifice taste. Not to mention, it’s the perfect dessert shop for that perfectly gorgeous Instagram pic. Some of their popular desserts include their delightful Strawberry Tofu Cheesecake (or any tofu cheesecake, to be honest), Lemon Meringue and Black Truffle Cheesecake Tart. Of course, every bakery or dessert cafe has those classic flavours, but what Cake Spade has in spades is flair. We recommend checking out their super detailed desserts from vintage ruffles to flowers, flamingos and even 3D Mao Shan Wang durians; their cake decorating skills are off the charts!

          7. Sunday Folks

          Source: Sunday Folks via Facebook – Dessert Singapore

          Facebook: Visit Here

          Instagram: Visit Here

          Website: https://sundayfolks.com/

          Address: Locations

          Operating Hours: Locations

          Whether or not it’s Sunday, folks, we’re sure that this dessert cafe will have the thing that will satisfy that sweet, sweet craving. Their handcrafted desserts are inspired by flavours from all over the world, celebrating each core ingredient in their craft. They’ve got freshly churned ice creams like Sea Salt Gula Melaka, irresistibly fresh waffles, and homemade cakes with flavours like Lemon Lavender and Winter Yuzu & Lychee. And of course, coffee on the side is a must! If you’re looking for a relaxing afternoon and some dessert in Singapore, Sunday Folks is one of the best places to visit!

          8. Atlas Coffeehouse

          Source: Atlas Coffeehouse via Facebook – Dessert Singapore

          Facebook: Visit Here

          Instagram: Visit Here

          Website: https://www.atlascoffeehouse.com.sg/

          Address: 6 Duke’s Road, Singapore 268886 

          Operating Hours: Tue-Sun, 8am-7pm

          There are three values this cafe prioritises: precision, seasonality and quality. With these three values, Atlas Coffeehouse provides quality through their specialty grade coffees and consistent food and dessert crafting. If you’re looking for classics with a twist, Atlas Coffeehouse is settled in Bukit Timah and ready to serve you tasty desserts that’ll make your mouth water!

          9. Plain Vanilla Bakery

          Source: Plain Vanilla Bakery via Facebook – Dessert Singapore

          Facebook: Visit Here

          Instagram: Visit Here

          Website: https://plainvanilla.com.sg/

          Address: Locations

          Operating Hours: Locations

          Plain Vanilla Bakery steps back, out of the hustle and bustle of fast moving trends, and creates time-honoured, nostalgic food and bakes. Just simple, consistent, timeless desserts made with wholesome ingredients and fresh produce. If you’re in the mood for something sweet, they’ve got cupcakes, breads, muffins, galettes, cookies and more. Don’t miss out on their tarts and brownies! And if you’re looking for a more substantial meal before dessert? Plain Vanilla also provides delicious foods that’ll satiate your hunger!

          10. 2am : Dessert Bar

          Source: 2am : Dessert Bar via Facebook – Dessert Singapore

          Facebook: Visit Here

          Instagram: Visit Here

          Website: https://2amdessertbar.com/

          Address: 21A Lor Liput, Singapore 277733

          Operating Hours: Tue-Sun, 1pm-12am

          Opened in 2007 by Janice Wong, a chef also famous for her delectable chocolates, 2am : Dessert Bar is the perfect place to visit if you’re looking for that late night sweet dessert in Singapore. Where artistry meets alchemy, with carefully crafted desserts that push the boundaries between sweet and savoury, 2am : Dessert Bar is as delicious as it is stylish and sleek. For those conscious of their diet, this dessert bar also has Keto and plant-based desserts. Who said dessert couldn’t be both healthy and tasty?

          Conclusion

          And there we have 10 of the best places to get dessert in Singapore! Now, when you get that craving for sweet treats, you know where to go!

          Now it’s time to go burn off those calories at the gym…
